title: OAuth and Sending Emails Fail
content:
When I set up an account (Outlook or Gmail) to use OAuth, sending emails fails. When I click 'send,' a large window flashes up, but then nothing happens until I receive a server time-out error.

When using OAuth for retrieving emails, no errors occur.

If I switch to an app password, then it works fine.

  • Using Thunderbird version 115.2.2.
creator: jake9wi

title: items in Thunderbird address book are overlapping and blurry
content: In thunderbird when I want to see a list of contact addresses, I go to Tools then addresses. The list is blurry, with both the person's name and address below it overlapping and a blurr. I could barely make out the list. The correct address works well when I write new email. My email for this help : home33@iinet.net.au
creator: forestcalm

title: Údržba složek Thunderbird se nedokončí
content: Opakovaně mi při pokusu o údržbu složky "Doručená pošta" píše: "Nelze provést údržbu složky "Doručená pošta" v účtu "Místní složky", protože nelze do složky zapisovat. Zkontrolujte, že máte dost místa a máte právo pro zápis do dané složky a postup opakujte." Přitom na disku je 274 GB místa a donedávna mi to vždy úspěšně proběhlo, navíc, když údržbu aplikuji na jiné složky, úspěšně proběhnou.
creator: ssedlacek

title: How to view saved emails in mbox
content: Downloaded Thunderbird in order to view backed-up gmail messages, that are in an .mbox container. (Thunderbird was suggested by online searches and made sense to me as a simple Firefox user. But that's all I'd like to use it for. And yes, I did donate:) But when I ask the .mbox file to 'Open With' Thunderbird, a 'Write' window opens - why? I need to stop using so much Google storage but am reluctant to simply delete when I don't know how to look at any backups! Any advice on what to do next would be gratefully received.
creator: susi.arnott

title: Thunderbird non scarica posta
content: Buongiorno. Stamattina windows 11 si e' aggiornato e da quel momento Thunderbird versione 115.2.2 ne' all'avvio ne' premendo il tasto scarica messaggi chiede la password e scarica la posta. Non fa nulla, nessun messaggio Grazie
creator: fabrizio.borra

title: Badge second Subfolder doesn't work using Filter emai function
content:
Hi Team, I have a problem with badge on the second Subfolder. The structure is (all collapsed): main Folder (ex. A), SubFolder (ex. A1), second SubFolder (ex. A2). When I receive an email, it move to A2 using Filter function. To the right of the "A" appears the badge (1) and text "A" is Bold and Blue color but "A1" doesen't appear the badge (1) and text "A1" is Normal and Black color. If I expande the "A1" I see "A2" and to the right of the "A2" appears the badge (1) and text "A2" is Bold and Blue color.

I hope that you understand Thanks! Massimo
creator: massimo11

title: Cannot Manage Messages
content: This is a Mac Monterey 12.6.9 with Thunderbird 102.15.1. I want my messages in chronological order, earliest on top, latest on bottom with no topical subdivisions. The dates keep skipping around. I do not remember arranging the date order of these messages being so difficult. What is the secret?
creator: tightpurchaser

title: Using Fastmail - Sent Folder is called Sent on win but "sent items" on Mac
content:
I use Fastmail In Fastmail's web app, the sent mail accumulates in a folder called "Sent" On Windows TB is configured to save sent messages in Fastmail's Sent folder. On Mac, if TB is configured to save messages in "Sent" they go into a folder called "Sent" but that folder does not have the same contents as the "Sent" folder in Fastmail's web app.

In fact. on the Mac I must configure TB to save in a folder called "Sent Items". If I do that then the messages also appear in the Sent folder on tb-Windows and on the Fastmail web app.

I find this very confusing. Perhaps someone can explain the discrepency

Thank you
creator: essin
